Name: AddressType
Title: AddressType
Descriptino: The type of an address (physical / postal).

Name: AddressUse
Title: AddressUse
Descriptino: The use of an address.

Name: AdministrativeGender
Title: AdministrativeGender
Descriptino: The gender of a person used for administrative purposes.

Name: BundleType
Title: BundleType
Descriptino: Indicates the purpose of a bundle - how it is intended to be used.

Name: ContactPointSystem
Title: ContactPointSystem
Descriptino: Telecommunications form for contact point.

Name: ContactPointUse
Title: ContactPointUse
Descriptino: Use of contact point.

Name: HTTPVerb
Title: HTTPVerb
Descriptino: HTTP verbs (in the HTTP command line). See [HTTP rfc](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7231) for details.

Name: Identifier Type Codes
Title: IdentifierType
Descriptino: A coded type for an identifier that can be used to determine which identifier to use for a specific purpose.

Name: IdentifierUse
Title: IdentifierUse
Descriptino: Identifies the purpose for this identifier, if known .

Name: CommonLanguages
Title: Common Languages
Descriptino: This value set includes common codes from BCP-47 (http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

Name: LinkType
Title: LinkType
Descriptino: The type of link between this patient resource and another patient resource.

Name: Marital Status Codes
Title: MaritalStatus
Descriptino: This value set defines the set of codes that can be used to indicate the marital status of a person.

Name: NameUse
Title: NameUse
Descriptino: The use of a human name.

Name: PatientContactRelationship
Title: Patient Contact Relationship
Descriptino: The nature of the relationship between the patient and the contact person.

Name: SearchEntryMode
Title: SearchEntryMode
Descriptino: Why an entry is in the result set - whether it's included as a match or because of an _include requirement, or to convey information or warning information about the search process.

Name: BackportContentValueSet
Title: Backported R5 Subscription Content Value Set
Descriptino: Codes to represent how much resource content to send in the notification payload.

Name: AddressValidationVS
Title: BC Address Validation Value Set
Descriptino: BC Address Validation value set used to describe the validation status of an address

Name: PatientChangeNotificationEventsValueSet
Title: BC Client Registry Patient Change Notification Events Value Set
Descriptino: Codes used to indicate that type of patient changes that a subscriber is interested in receiving.

Name: UpdatePatientOperationVS
Title: BC Update Patient Operation Value Set
Descriptino: A Value Set of allowed update operations.

Name: ContactPointSystemVS
Title: BC Contact Point System Value Set
Descriptino: BC Contact Point System value set, sliced to meet BC constraints.

Name: ContactPointUseVS
Title: BC Contact Point Use Value Set
Descriptino: BC Contact Point Use value set, sliced to meet BC constraints.

Name: IdentifierStatusVS
Title: BC Identifier Status Value Set
Descriptino: BC Identifier Status value set used to describe the status of an identifier.

Name: MergeStatusVS
Title: BC Merge Status Value Set
Descriptino: BC Merge Status value set used to describe the merge status of a Patient.

Name: NameUseVS
Title: BC Name Use value set.
Descriptino: BC Name Use value set, sliced to meet BC constraints.
